node.name: hakeemy
node.description: This project aims to develop an application and website to facilitate the connection between doctors and patients. The repository includes Android, iOS, and Web with 95%+ code sharing between them. Additionally, it encompasses the backend API designed for this project.

node.name: workflow
node.description: The goal of this project is to develop an automated internal workflow system for organizations or businesses, aimed at transitioning from manual operations to a more efficient, automated process.

node.name: tmooh
node.description: This project is essentially a clone of Udemy, but it is specifically designed for Arab communities. The construction of this project was accomplished using the Angular framework.

node.name: arbitrage-bot
node.description: This script is designed with the objective of identifying profitable arbitrage opportunities between two decentralized exchanges and executing the trade via flash loans.
